author: hqucms
body:
This is based on the official [MXNet 1.5.0](https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/releases/tag/1.5.0), with the thread-safety patch (introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4207) applied for use in CMSSW. The new version is needed for some ongoing developments for a (possible) future version of DeepAK8. 

The code with the patch applied currently lives in [my repo](https://github.com/hqucms/incubator-mxnet/tree/1.5.0-cms-mod) and needs to be ported to [cms-externals](https://github.com/cms-externals/incubator-mxnet/).
title: Update MXNet to 1.5.0
